alert.note: Alert for Echols; Southern Ware (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 10 at 4:22PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Echols, west central Ware and central Clinch Counties through 500 PM EDT... At 421 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles southeast of Du Pont, or 9 miles south of Homerville, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of north central Echols, west central Ware and central Clinch Counties. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
